com.clearblade.platform.api

Class Collection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clearblade.platform.api.Collection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Item>

    public class Collection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Item>
    This class consists exclusively of instance methods that operate on ClearBlade Collections.

    ClearBlade Collections are objects that can query Cloud backend collections for Items. A typical example would be: 

     
                Collection collection = new Collection(collectionId);
                collection.fetchAll(new DataCallback(){
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Clyde Byrd, Aaron Allsbrook
    See Also:
    Item, Query, ClearBladeException

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create(java.lang.String columns,
                   DataCallback callback)

      • update

        public void update(DataCallback callback)

      • remove

        public void remove(DataCallback callback)
        Deletes all Items that are saved in the collection in the Cloud synchronously.

        Deleted Items will be stored locally in the Collection.

        *Overrides previously stored Items* *Runs in its own asynchronous task*
        Throws:
        ClearBladeException - will be returned in the callback error function

      • getItems

        public Item[] getItems()
        Returns all items in the collection as item[].
        Parameters:
        json - A JSON Array in string format
        Returns:
        Item[] An array of Items
        Throws:
        ClearBladeException - will be thrown if Collection was Empty!

      • fetch

        public void fetch(Query query,
                  DataCallback callback)
        Gets all Items that match Query criteria from the platform in the Cloud.

        Retrieved Items will be stored locally in the Collection.

        *Overrides previously stored Items* *Runs in its own asynchronous task*
        Throws:
        ClearBladeException - will be returned in callback.error() if the collection was empty

      • fetch

        public void fetch(DataCallback callback)
        Gets all Items that match Query criteria from the platform in the Cloud.

        Retrieved Items will be stored locally in the Collection.

        *Overrides previously stored Items* *Runs in its own asynchronous task*
        Throws:
        ClearBladeException - will be returned in callback.error() if the collection was empty

      • fetchAll

        public void fetchAll(DataCallback callback)
        Gets all Items that are saved in the collection in the Cloud.

        Retrieved Items will be stored locally in the Collection.

        *Overrides previously stored Items* *Runs in its own asynchronous task*
        Throws:
        ClearBladeException - will be returned in callback.error() if the collection was empty

      • fetchAllSync

        public Item[] fetchAllSync()
                    throws ClearBladeException
        Throws:
        ClearBladeException

      • getQuery

        public Query getQuery()
        Returns the query to be performed during a call to ClearBladeCollection.fetch(). will be null if not set by setQuery().
        Returns:
        query The conditional query to perform on a Cloud Collection

      • iterator

        public java.util.Iterator<Item> iterator()
        Returns an Item Iterator for the ClearBladeC ollection.

        Will point at the first Item in the collection that is retrieved from a ClearBladeCollection.fetch() or ClearBladeCollection.clear().

        Specified by:
        iterator in interface java.lang.Iterable<Item>
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - will be thrown if a call to ClearBladeCollection.fetch() or ClearBladeCollection.clear() has not been made

      • setQuery

        public void setQuery(Query query)
        Sets the query to be performed during a call to ClearBladeCollection.get()
        Parameters:
        query - A conditional String that will determine what Items to retrieve from the Cloud Database

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Helper method for debugging collection contents
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
